Semantic Search Functionality: Where do you want to go?


Browse our corpus and annotations

Corpus Information

Corpus Stats for corpus created from airbnb and tripadvisor overview and reviews

Total number of documents: 5,328
Total number of sentences: 78,060
Total number of tokens: 1,486,436
Total number of types: 50,607
% Documents automatically annotated: 90%
Number of documents where annotations were validated by humans ( Amazon Mechanical Turk ): 267
Inter Annotator Agreement Score: 47%

Note: This score was achieved on the annotation which was free text, non fixed number and multi word - 'Objects' of RDF Subject, Predicate, Object Triples
